summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA Brightening Toner is a concentrate that deep clean pores, remove excess oil & impurities for softer, smoother skin for a radiant complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsA brightening toner that helps soften skin and control oilinessUnique Barrier Lipid Complex helps restore the skin barrierLactic and mandelic acids gently exfoliateUrea and birch extracts improve tone and textureDermatologist tested & approved skincareAlcohol & fragrance-freeGentle enough for daily useRecyclable bottlesClinically proven to boost hydration by up to 100% after first useClinically proven to protect and maintain skin's natural barrier when used regularlyClinically proven to boost hydration all dayFeaturesFeaturing Byoma's unique Barrier Lipid Complex, this lactic and mandelic acid-based formula combined with urea and birch extractsWorks to gently exfoliate skin to help improve tone and texture without compromising the skin barrier.Key IngredientsBarrier Lipid Complex to help restore the skin barrierLactic and Mandelic Acid gently exfoliates to improve tone and textureUrea and birch extracts improve tone and textureItem 2611684How To UseApply to clean, dry skin with hands and pat gently into face, neck and décolletage. Use AM + PM. Follow with your preferred Byoma serums + moisturizer.Precautions: Eye irritant.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Lactate, Lactic Acid, Glycerin, Diglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Urea, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Ceramide NP, Mandelic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Sphingolipids, Sodium Phytate, Betula Alba Juice, Tocopherol, Benzaldehyde, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin with hands and pat gently into face, neck and décolletage. Use AM + PM. Follow with your preferred Byoma serums + moisturizer.Precautions: Eye irritant.

reviews.headline: never again
reviews.comments: i wanted to love it, i love the gel cream but this is a hard no for me it stung and burned upon contact mind you this was the only product on my face.

reviews.headline: Rough on Skin
reviews.comments:
I don't have sensitive skin, and this product burns/stings my face and dries it out. Not comfortable to use. Disappointing as I love that the brand is vegan/cruelty free.

The packaging is nice.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This product dose not irritate my skin.

reviews.headline: burns your pore.
reviews.comments: I love this toner. but it burns my zits! but I love how shinny it makes my face. it could've been better. LOVE BYOMA :)

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Product is amazing. I have sensitive and red skin so its easily irritated but this product does NOT irritate my skin at all. My impurities have significantly gone done since i started. Using this product. Would highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Not a win for this sensitive skin girlie
reviews.comments:
I bought this toner (jelly cleanser + Barrier repair) based on the BYOMA skin care test on their website.). Worst line of products ive ever used. woke up face swollen, rash and chemical burn all over my face.

Bottom Line: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

reviews.headline: broke me out
reviews.comments: I gave this 2 stars cause it's a good consistency and it's a decent toner, but it broke me out. I had been struggling with acne on my forehead and after I started using this I started breaking out on my cheeks and nose.

reviews.headline: Broke me out
reviews.comments: I have dry-combo & sensitive skin. Only used it a few times throughout the span of 2 weeks. Leaves a weird sticky feeling on even when using a cotton pad. Gave a tingling sensation as well none of my other toners do that.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: It stings a lottle but wow she makes my skin look pretty. I have sensitive & acne prone skin, this did not break me out at all. Hallelujah!

reviews.headline: Nice Exfoiliator
reviews.comments: I purchased this to add to my skincare routine two or three times a week- not as a daily toner. The glycolic acid exfoliator I was using just was not giving the results I would like so I wanted to try something new and this was something in a decent price range that would not break the bank. The bottle says for use twice a day, but I really don't recommend that unless you have super oily skin otherwise you will compromise your skin barrier. It did sting a bit after I put it on, but that usually happens with all acids I use. It went away in about 2 minutes or less, I used azelaic acid to target some acne spots I had, added moisturizer, and went to bed. Woke up to nice, bright skin. Did not break me out more. For reference I am 30, with acne-prone normal to dry skin now that I am getting older.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: help brighten skin and it is amazing I love it

reviews.headline: I will purchase this product again
reviews.comments: I will purchased this product again

reviews.headline: i would by this product forever
reviews.comments: it makes my skin so soft and it doesn't dry it out.

reviews.headline: Not for all skin types
reviews.comments: I used this product twice and on the second day my skin was a complete mess. Dry, flaky and itchy. Before the product my skin was well nourished. My fault for being influenced to add another step to my skincare.

reviews.headline: I love this toner!
reviews.comments: This has had such a good effect on my skin! It feels brighter and smoother with every use

reviews.headline: I LOVE THIS
reviews.comments: I have kp which basically means my skin doesn't exfoliate itself which causes tiny little bumps on my face. The lactic acid in here made them SO much better.

reviews.headline: Too drying
reviews.comments: This  toner overstripped my skin. Would not recommend as a daily toner. Maybe like once a week for exfoliation.

reviews.headline: Love the brand, but not for me ￼
reviews.comments: If you're looking for a toner, don't get this if you're looking for exfoliate get this

reviews.headline: Good for acne prone skin!
reviews.comments: Way better than I ever expected.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Gift for my daughter and she absolutely loved this product her skin looks amazing!

media.headline: This lovely toner is an easy step towards glowing,
media.caption: Use at Night

media.headline: leaves my sensitive skin feeling wonderful
media.caption: it leaves my sensitive skin feeling wonderful.

faceoff_positive.comments:
BYOMA is here with neon-coloured skin care saviours designed with 'no fillers, no fluff'. Gentle enough for daily use, this brightening facial toner works to clear pores and control oiliness for softer, smoother skin and a more radiant complexion.

  The Brightening Toner is the first product I've tried from Byoma and I was surprised at how great of a product it is! I love the fun neon orange color and shape of the bottle - really easy to spot on my counter. I love that the bottle tells you exactly when and how to use this product. This toner should only be used at night. It says on the bottle to pour it on my hands and pat on my face, but I pour it on a cotton round and swipe it around my face and that works really well. It has a medium density and is easy to spread on the face. It's amazing how much excess oil/dirt the toner removes that the face wash didn't get. There was no burning from the lactic acid like I've had with products before.

  I have only been using this product for a short period of time and I can already tell a difference with my skin. I have combination skin and this does a great job of balancing it. My skin and face feel so hydrated after using it and not only does it clean, it also gently exfoliate, brightens my complexion, re-hydrates, smooths skin, helps restore compromised skin barrier, tones so you don't stay oily, and my pores have decreased. It's definitely putting youth back in to my face and neck! It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry or irritated, or a weird texture or tackiness at all. 

  Con: When I first went to apply the toner, it poured out. I don't like how large the opening is. It should come with an applicator or smaller opening. Otherwise it is easy to use. 

  A beauty essential that penetrates deep into the pores and results in a more radiant complexion, is a product that I can get behind! This multi-purpose product is the only one you need because of how many benefits come with it!
faceoff_positive.headline: This lovely toner is an easy step towards glowing,

faceoff_negative.comments: The Byoma Brightening toner comes in a peachy orange 150 ml container with a twist off lid. There is initially a small aluminum cap over the opening that needs to be pulled off so it doesn't spill. The lid does a good job keeping the toner in without the covering if it is tipped over. I used the toner on clean skin after washing my face at bedtime. I put it on a cotton pad to rub/pat over my face and neck. I did not need to use very much to get everything and it did have a tiny sting to it but my skin is very dry right now so that could be the reason. I do think my skin feels nice after applying but I haven't noticed my skin tone/texture changing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Toner
